abstract: Defense team for Thomas Gilbert Jr, who is accused of fatally shooting his father, hedge fund manager Thomas Gilbert Sr, in family's Manhattan apartment in 2014, argues at pre-trial hearing that younger Gilbert struggled with serious mental illness for years and is not fit to stand trial.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Gilbert Jr., who is accused of killing his father in January during an argument over spending money, has a serious mental illness, his lawyer argued in a hearing this month.

headline.main: Mental Illness Cited in Murder Case of Manhattan Hedge Fund Manager
headline.print_headline: Defense Cites Years of Mental Illness in Case of Fund Manager’s Killing
